key.name: update-interval
key.description: How often to update the battery levels (in minutes)

key.name: show-hover-percentage
key.description: When enabled, hovering over the panel icon shows the battery percentage. Ignored when "Always show percentage" is on. Disable to avoid layout shifts when multiple icons are in the panel.

key.name: always-show-percentage
key.description: When enabled, the battery percentage is always visible in the panel, without needing to hover.
